QuestData.Title: Seek Out Neltharaku
QuestData.Description: Their patron soars high above, $n. Perhaps the kindness that you showed his children has moved his heart. Seek Neltharaku out and enlist his aid. Together, you may be able to solve the plight of the Netherwing drakes.$B$B<Mordenai points to the sky.>$B$BFly high, friend...
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Neltharaku, patron of the Netherwing Dragonflight.
QuestData.RewardText: My children have told me of your heroic deeds, $r. There is more that you can do.
